attribute-definition.description: When set to "Yes," the system will automatically attempt a full capture of the order. The capture request sent through the standalone Order Management API will include the total order amount as the "captured_amount."

The field from SCC order (basket) object that is mapped to merchant_reference2 field from klarna API request. Has to be one of the class attributes of SCC LineItemCtnr. Note that for complex data structures result may vary
CSS (hex value) color set for Border in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for selected element Border in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for Button in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for Button text in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for Checkbox in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for checkbox checked(selected) in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for details in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for Header in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for link in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for text in Klarna Payments iFrame
CSS (hex value) color set for secondary text in Klarna Payments iFrame
Value (in pixels) of the border radius to be used in Klarna Payments iFrame
Additional Logging helps to get more order details when issue occurs
Toggle (Yes/No) for the inclusion of attachments when creating an order. Specific to inclusion of EMD (customer_account_info, other_delivery_address) when applicable
When set to "Yes," each Klarna order will automatically generate a Virtual Card Number upon settlement request.
UUIDv4 value corresponding to the key pair. Shared with Klarna respectively for Production & Playground (test) environment.
Klarna Authorization and Order creation steps will be triggered on Checkout Review page when customer clicks CTA/Place Order Button.
Only use "Based on Adjusted Price" value if you have enabled the corresponding value in “Merchant Tools > Site Preferences > Promotions > Discount Taxation” and use gross taxation.
If set to “Yes”, SFCC will retry the VCN settlement once again in case of service error. Default is “No”
Enable OMS
Agent user used to login on behalf of customers to create subscriptions orders
Agent user password used to login on behalf of customers to create subscriptions orders
Retry Frequency in days
Token used to verify the caller for recurring orders
Reduce fraud rates through verified identities and consented shopper data, improve personalized shopping experiences.
Select the scope for Sign-in with Klarna.
Tailor Sign-in with Klarna theme to fit your brand and shop.
Offer a 6x faster check-out process that will lower the threshold for shoppers to complete a purchase.
Tailor the Express checkout button to fit your brand by adjusting the button theme.
Add personalized messaging throughout the shopper journey for higher conversion rates and increased spend.
To unlock the plugin’s features, enter your credentials. Get the client identifier and API credentials from the Klarna Merchant Portal, under Settings.
Select the region where your store operates.
Select the market(s) where your store operates.

Give your customers the ability to pay in flexible ways such as Buy now, Pay Later, Invoicing, Instalments and Financing.
Klarna payments is required to enable the additional solutions.
Enable this option to include customer_account_info and other_delivery_address as attachments when creating an order.
When set to “Yes”, SFCC will automatically retry the VCN settlement in the event of a service error.
Enter the attribute from the SCC order (basket) object that you would like to forward as an additional merchant reference to Klarna. This attribute must be a class attribute of the SCC LineItemCtnr.
Agent username used to login on behalf of customers to create subscription orders
Agent password to login on behalf of customers to create subscription orders
The Klarna payments Order ID for Klarna payment method selected by customer
True if virtual card is enabled & used for payment of the order, otherwise false
Klarna Payments virtual card scheme name
Klarna Payments virtual card holder name
Klarna Payments Virtual Card AES Key
Klarna Payments Virtual Card - Card ID
Klarna Payments Virtual Card Initialization Vector
Klarna Payments Virtual Card PCI Data in encrypted format
ID of Klarna payment category
Name of Klarna payment category
Klarna Payments order fraud status
Enriched data for product line item.
Enriched data for shipment.
